meta.title: Watu Care - Medical Supplies for Africa & Middle East
meta.description: Medical devices and PPE from Asian manufacturers. B2B wholesale for healthcare facilities in Africa and the Middle East. Based in Hong Kong.

hero.subtitle: Quality medical devices and PPE from Asia.

whyUs.title: Why Watu Care
whyUs.subtitle: We connect healthcare providers with quality medical supplies from Asia.
whyUs.hubDesc: Strategic location connecting Asian manufacturers directly to healthcare facilities across Africa and the Middle East.
whyUs.directDesc: We work directly with manufacturers to ensure quality products and competitive pricing.
whyUs.serviceDesc: Quick quote turnaround and dedicated support throughout your order process.
whyUs.catalogDesc: Comprehensive range of medical supplies across multiple categories to meet your facility's needs.

categories.title: Our Products
categories.subtitle: Explore our range of medical supplies from Asian manufacturers.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Medical supply solutions across specialized categories

surgical.title: Procedure Packs & Drapes
surgical.description: Pre-assembled sterile kits for surgical procedures.
surgical.longDescription: Complete range of sterile surgical packs including drapes, gowns, and procedure-specific kits. Available in standard and custom configurations to match your facility's protocols.

tube.title: Tubes & Airway Management
tube.description: Endotracheal tubes, masks, and breathing circuits.
tube.longDescription: Full selection of airway management products including endotracheal tubes, oxygen masks, laryngeal masks, and anesthesia circuits. Multiple sizes available for pediatric to adult patients.

central-venous-catheter.title: Anti-Infection Central Venous Catheter
central-venous-catheter.longDescription: Central venous catheters with antimicrobial coating to reduce catheter-related infections. Available in single, double, triple, and quad lumen configurations with complete kit options.

dressing.title: Dressing & Kits
dressing.description: Wound care dressings and sterile procedure kits.
dressing.longDescription: Comprehensive wound care solutions including hydrocolloid, alginate, foam, and film dressings. Also available: surgical tapes, swabs, and complete sterile dressing packs.

laboratory-supplies.title: Laboratory Supplies
laboratory-supplies.description: Specimen collection tubes and diagnostic supplies.
laboratory-supplies.longDescription: Laboratory specimen collection products including vacuum blood collection tubes, urine containers, culture swabs, and safety needles. ISO-certified for diagnostic accuracy.

veterinary-products.title: Veterinary Products
veterinary-products.longDescription: Dedicated veterinary product line including surgical drapes, endotracheal tubes, IV catheters, feeding tubes, and wound care supplies. Sized for various animal patients.

medical-equipment.title: Medical Equipment
medical-equipment.description: Diagnostic devices and patient care equipment.
medical-equipment.longDescription: Essential medical equipment for healthcare facilities including thermometers, blood pressure monitors, pulse oximeters, nebulizers, and hospital beds.

gloves.title: Gloves
gloves.description: Examination and surgical gloves in latex, nitrile, and vinyl.
gloves.longDescription: Full range of medical gloves including latex, nitrile, and vinyl options. Available in examination and sterile surgical grades, powdered or powder-free.

face-protection.title: Face Protection
face-protection.description: Surgical masks and protective face shields.
face-protection.longDescription: Infection control products including 3-ply surgical masks with high bacterial filtration efficiency and reusable face shields for comprehensive facial protection.

bodily-waste-management.title: Bodily Waste Management
bodily-waste-management.description: Emesis bags, bedpans, and drainage systems.
bodily-waste-management.longDescription: Patient care products for waste management including emesis bags, reusable bedpans and urinals, and sterile urine drainage systems.

basic-universal-pack.name: Basic Universal Pack

reinforced-universal-pack.description: Universal surgical pack with reinforced gowns for enhanced barrier protection during general surgical procedures.
reinforced-universal-pack.name: Reinforced Universal Pack

craniotomy-pack.description: Specialized neurosurgery pack with dedicated craniotomy drape and reinforced gowns for brain surgery procedures.
craniotomy-pack.name: Craniotomy Pack

dental-pack.description: Complete dental procedure kit with dental drape, tube covers, gowns, and hand towels.
dental-pack.name: Dental Pack

shoulder-pack.description: Orthopedic pack configured for shoulder surgery with specialized shoulder drape and suture collection bag.
shoulder-pack.name: Shoulder Pack

laparoscopy-pack.description: Minimally invasive surgery kit with laparoscopy drape, yankauer suction set, and lap sponges.

delivery-pack.description: Standard delivery kit with underbuttock drape, leggings, baby wrapper, and essential delivery supplies.

extremity-pack.description: Surgical pack for upper and lower extremity procedures with extremity drape and leggings.

tur-pack.description: Transurethral resection pack with specialized TUR drape for urological procedures.

suction-catheter.description: Yankauer-style suction catheters with lateral eyes for continuous suction flow during procedures.

alginate-dressing.description: High-absorbency calcium alginate dressing for moderate to heavily exuding wounds.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps to get the medical supplies you need.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Share your product requirements, quantities, and delivery location through our quote form.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our team reviews your request and provides a quote with shipping and logistics details.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Once approved, we handle procurement and shipping until your order arrives.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about working with Watu Care.
faq.moqQuestion: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
faq.moqAnswer: MOQ varies by product category. For most items, we work with quantities suitable for healthcare facilities of all sizes. Contact us with your specific needs and we'll provide tailored options.
faq.deliveryAnswer: Delivery times depend on your location and order size. Typically, orders to Africa and the Middle East take 2-4 weeks after confirmation. We provide tracking information for all shipments.
faq.regionsQuestion: Which regions do you deliver to?
faq.regionsAnswer: We deliver to healthcare facilities across Africa and the Middle East. Our Hong Kong hub enables efficient shipping to major ports and logistics centers throughout these regions.
faq.certificationsQuestion: What certifications do your products have?
faq.certificationsAnswer: Our products come from manufacturers that meet international quality standards including CE marking and ISO certifications. We can provide specific certification documents upon request.
faq.paymentQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept bank transfers (T/T) and letters of credit (L/C) for larger orders. Payment terms are discussed during the quotation process based on order size and relationship.
faq.supportQuestion: What after-sales support do you provide?
faq.supportAnswer: Our team provides support throughout the order process and after delivery. We assist with product inquiries, documentation, and any issues that may arise with your order.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Watu Care privacy policy. How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Watu Care ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy. This policy explains how we handle information when you use our website.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide when requesting quotes, including your name, email address, organization, and product requirements. We also collect standard website usage data through cookies and analytics.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to respond to quote requests, communicate about orders, improve our services, and send relevant product updates. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your information with manufacturing partners solely to fulfill orders. We may also share data when required by law or to protect our rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for website functionality and analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. Our website uses HTTPS encryption for all data transmission.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, contact us at contact@watu-care.com.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Watu Care terms of service for B2B medical wholesale.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the Watu Care website and services. By using our website, you agree to these terms.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Watu Care provides B2B medical supply wholesale services. All products are intended for professional healthcare use. Pricing is quote-based and subject to order volume, product selection, and delivery destination.

quotes.title: Quotes and Orders
quotes.content: Quote requests are not binding. Pricing and availability are confirmed upon formal quotation. Orders are subject to our acceptance and product availability from manufacturing partners.

products.title: Products and Quality
products.content: We source products from manufacturers meeting international quality standards (CE, ISO). Product specifications and certifications are provided upon request. Images on our website are representative and actual products may vary slightly.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Watu Care acts as a wholesale distributor. While we ensure quality sourcing, product liability follows applicable manufacturer warranties and international trade terms agreed upon in each order.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on this website, including text, images, and branding, is owned by Watu Care. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Hong Kong SAR. Disputes will be resolved through arbitration in Hong Kong.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Questions about these terms can be directed to contact@watu-care.com.
